00016 class Camp : public Element {
00017 private:

00019 
00020 public:
00028      inline Camp(const Reference &ref, const Shape &location, int nFactions) : Element(ref, location) {
00029           mPopulation = new double[nFactions + 1];
00030           for (int i = 0; i < nFactions + 1; i++) {
00031                mPopulation[i] = 0;
00032           }
00033      }
00034      
00036      inline ~Camp() { if (mPopulation) { delete [] mPopulation; } }
00037 
00043      inline bool present() const { return true; }
00044 
00051      inline double population(int f = 0) { return mPopulation[f]; }
00052 
00059      inline void addPopulation(double pop, int f = 0) { mPopulation[f] += pop; }
00060 };
